text:
William Rush (born 6 July 1994) is a English actor, known for his role as Josh Stevenson in the BBC One school-based drama series, "Waterloo Road", from 2009 to 2013. He has also acted in other British television series such as "Grange Hill", "Shameless", "Drop Dead Gorgeous", "Casualty", "Coronation Street", and "Vera".
Personal life.
Rush is the son of "Coronation Street" actress Debbie Rush.
